posts.subject: /cvg/ Corona Virus General
posts.body:
==Stats==
1.73M pozzed | 106K dead | 386K escapees
208 countries infected

==What we know==
> April
- Animals can get infected, including dogs, cats, ferrets and tigers [WashingtonExaminer 2020-04-05](https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/news/tiger-at-bronx-zoo-tests-positive-for-coronavirus-marking-first-known-animal-infection-in-us)
- Low Antibody Levels in recovered patients raise questions about reinfection possibility [SCMP 2020-04-07](https://www.scmp.com/news/china/science/article/3078840/coronavirus-low-antibody-levels-raise-questions-about) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/Up2gq#selection-1967.221-1990.0)
- Infects T lymphocytes [Nature 2020-04-07](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41423-020-0424-9) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/zvbcU)
- Shows signs of ADE, that's goodbye vaccine [Nature 2020-04-09](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41577-020-0308-3) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/D59U2)
- S. Korea: 30 new cases, 91 recovered test positive again [YNA 2020-04-10](https://m-en.yna.co.kr/view/AEN20200410006500320) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/BpD5k)

> March
- Survives on surfaces for up to 17 days [Bloomberg 2020-03-23](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-03-23/coronavirus-traces-lingered-in-vacated-cruise-cabins-for-17-days) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/j8og6)
- We Airborne lads, say herro to the SARS Luftwaffe [IBT 2020-03-18 (Archive)](https://archive.is/VY9KJ)
- You wanted kids? Male fertility down in survivors [SCMP 2020-03-26](https://www.scmp.com/news/china/science/article/3077113/wuhan-doctors-plan-long-term-look-coronavirus-impact-male-sex) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/3G21P)
- Hydroxychloroquine and Azithromycin trials show drugs may not work [ScienceDirect 2020-03-30 (Archive)](https://archive.is/)
- Virus travels 8m, stays in air for hours says MIT [NYP 2020-03-31](https://nypost.com/2020/03/31/coronavirus-could-travel-27-feet-stay-in-air-for-hours-mit-researcher/) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/UewJG)
- 8 strains of SARS-CoV-2 are being tracked [USA Today 2020-03-31](https://eu.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2020/03/27/scientists-track-coronavirus-strains-mutation/5080571002/) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/eypTs)

> February
- ACE2 expression in Kidney and Testis suggests these could be damaged [Medrxiv 2020-02-12](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.02.12.20022418v1) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/I6wRu)
- T Cells exhausted in patients [Medrxiv 2020-02-20](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.02.18.20024364v1) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/2EQ6x)
- Recovered patients may still be able infect others [Newsweek 2020-02-21](https://www.newsweek.com/coronavirus-recovered-patients-traces-virus-1488410)
- Recovered people can get reinfected [BI 2020-02-27](https://www.businessinsider.com/wuhan-coronavirus-risk-of-reinfection-2020-2?r=DE&IR=T) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/tjjat)
- Neuroinvasive potential may play role in respiratory failure [PubMed 2020-02-27](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32104915/) & [(Archive)](https://archive.is/E2CiO)

==The Wuhan Health Organization Are Corrupt Bonus==
- Tedros accused of crimes against humanity in Ethiopia [ECADF 2017-04-23 (Archive)](https://archive.is/UJUfE)
- Tedros accused of covering up Cholera outbreaks [NYT 2017-05-13 (Archive)](https://archive.is/MjY6H)
